## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G16890](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G16890)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PPR40</u>
- **Gene Name:** pentatricopeptide (PPR) domain protein 40
- **Description:**   pentatricopeptide (PPR) domain protein 40;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2086032
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_071712]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;semi-dwarf; enhanced sensitivity to salt, ABA and oxidative stress; reduced electron transport through Complex III (cytochrome c reductase).
   - [ppr40-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;semi-dwarf; enhanced sensitivity to salt, ABA and oxidative stress; reduced electron transport through Complex III (cytochrome c reductase).
